epic.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a book, poem, or film that tells a long story about brave actions and exciting events
epic.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: an epic book, poem, or film tells a long story about brave actions and exciting events
epic.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: an epic tale of mutiny on the high seas
epic.translation[1].definitions[1].defin: an epic event continues for a long time and involves brave or exciting actions
epic.translation[1].definitions[1].examp: his epic journey to South America
epic.translation[1].definitions[2].examp: He had produced a meal of epic proportions.
